channel.title: Other File I/O :: Data Structures in C#
channel.description: Other File I/O Not all files are plain text files â€” often we need to read and/or write binary data. .NET provides the FileStream class for this purpose. The FileStream class provides constructors for creating a FileStream for reading, writing, or both. These constructors can be used to specify how the file is to be opened or created, the type of access to be allowed (i.e., reading/writing), and how the file is to be locked.
